title: What is the role of modern methods in teaching English in secondary school? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion, modern methods are being developed daily, blended, P2P, and online learning initiatives have come along way in the last decade. Yet, it is still in its infancy. In relation to English, and its transformation into an international language, we have to begin looking at it as such, and teach it as such. Pretty amazing time,;language and linguistics is fluid and culture guides its flow and expression. The role of language should allow the student the skills to communicate effectively, written, orally, as well as provide receptive and analytic abilities to adapt language/communication, vocabulary, and expression most effectively.
